mapper.select:
select
from unit_info WHERE 1=1
AND org_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND org_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and (status is null or status ='9')
and status = '0'
and status = '1'
and status = '2'
ORDER BY ID DESC
